divs: Sighting DetailsTwo women observed a bright stationary object in the distance with an apparentsize of one-fourth of the full moon. A deputy sheriff joined them and agreedthat the object appeared anomalous. Through a camcorders viewfinder, the objecthad a bell shape with a bluish white body, a broad rim at the bottom, andsequentially pulsating red, white and blue lights at or near the rim. After 70minutes, the object moved slowly and laterally for 2-3 minutes before being lostfrom view in the distance.
Summary: Prolonged presence of bell-shaped object in MI.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Oakley
This sighting has never been favorited.
